title: Cursor v2.4: Subagents, Skills, and Image Generation
description: Major release introducing Subagents (parallel independent agents with custom context), Skills (domain-specific reusable workflows), and image generation capabilities. Also added Plan mode, Ask mode in CLI, cloud handoff for background tasks, word-level inline diffs, one-click MCP authentication, and enterprise features including Cursor Blame for AI code attribution.

community_feedback.quote: 75 agent skills YOU have to HAVE in 2026

title: GitHub Copilot CLI: Enhanced Agents, Context Management, and New Installation Methods
description: Released four built-in custom agents (Explore, Task, Plan, Code-review) that run in parallel. Added GPT-5 mini and GPT-4.1 models, improved context management with auto-compaction at 95% token limit, new installation methods via WinGet/Homebrew, automation flags for CI/CD, and enhanced terminal experience with better diffs and tab completion.

community_feedback.quote: Subagents are now INCREDIBLY functional, its wild
New features coming in January release are hot

title: Wave 14: Arena Mode and Plan Mode
description: Introduced Arena Mode for side-by-side model comparison with hidden identities, allowing users to vote on performance and contribute to personal/global leaderboards. Added Plan Mode for detailed implementation planning before coding, with 'megaplan' trigger for advanced clarifying questions. Also added enterprise features for organization-wide command auto-execution policies.

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Model Support
description: Added support for GPT-5.2-Codex with four reasoning effort levels (low, medium, high, xhigh). OpenAI's latest model designed specifically for agentic coding, optimized for working in large codebases over long sessions.

title: Agent Skills Support for Cascade
description: Windsurf now supports Agent Skills for Cascade, enabling dynamic context discovery and procedural instructions for specialized agent capabilities based on tasks.

title: Devin Review Feature Launch
description: Launched Devin Review, an AI-powered code review tool that helps developers quickly understand Pull Requests by intelligently organizing related code changes, providing concise explanations, detecting bugs and warnings early, identifying copied/moved code, and delivering severity-based insights to reduce review time.

community_feedback.quote: Devin Review: Challenging the Github PR process status quo
Cognition is entering a new era of product polish in 2026

title: API v3 Enterprise Queue Monitoring
description: Added GET /v3beta1/enterprise/queue endpoint for enterprise administrators to monitor session queue status. Minor bug fixes and performance improvements across the platform.

title: Version 23.0 with Experimental Agent Skills
description: Released version 23.0 introducing experimental Agent Skills support in preview builds. Also added 'computer use' tools support for gemini-3-pro-preview and gemini-3-flash-preview models, enabling new AI agent capabilities.

title: Codex CLI 0.89.0 - Custom Prompts Deprecated
description: Released Codex CLI 0.89.0, which deprecates custom prompts in favor of 'skills' for reusable instructions and workflows. Added personality system prompt update on January 22, 2026.

community_feedback.quote: What's New notification and model usage guidance was discussed

title: Codex CLI 0.93.0 with SOCKS5 Proxy
description: Added optional SOCKS5 proxy listener with policy enforcement and improved 'Plan' functionality. User message metadata now round-trips through protocol/app-server/core, allowing UI annotations to survive history rebuilds.

community_feedback.quote: CodexSwitcher升级，大幅优化Codex CLI配置与会话管理

title: Aider January 2026 Development Activity
description: Active GitHub development with issues and feature requests including color output fixes, local Ollama model support improvements, Patch Review Assistant feature requests, DeepSeek reasoner model support, and reasoning model thinking visualization requests.

community_feedback.quote: Bug report: Assistant output color changes to white whenever aider restarts
Suggestion: See what the reasoning models are thinking
